title: Certification API Routes
description:
Create REST API Routes for Certification Management with CMS Compliance Validation

Build a comprehensive REST API for managing certifications with integrated CMS (Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services) compliance validation.

Requirements:
- Define RESTful endpoints for certification CRUD operations:
  - GET /certifications - List all certifications with filtering/pagination
  - GET /certifications/:id - Retrieve specific certification details
  - POST /certifications - Create new certification
  - PUT/PATCH /certifications/:id - Update existing certification
  - DELETE /certifications/:id - Remove certification

- Implement CMS compliance validation:
  - Validate certification data against CMS regulatory requirements
  - Check required fields per CMS specifications
  - Validate certification dates (issue, expiration, renewal periods)
  - Verify certification types against approved CMS categories
  - Return clear validation error messages with specific compliance failures

- Data handling:
  - Define certification schema/model with all required CMS fields
  - Implement proper request/response data structures
  - Handle file uploads for certification documents if applicable
  - Support bulk operations if needed

- Security and access control:
  - Add authentication middleware to protect endpoints
  - Implement role-based authorization (who can create/modify/view certifications)
  - Sanitize and validate all input data
  - Log certification changes for audit trail

- Error handling:
  - Return appropriate HTTP status codes (200, 201, 400, 401, 403, 404, 500)
  - Provide detailed error messages for validation failures
  - Handle database connection errors gracefully

- Testing:
  - Create test cases for each endpoint
  - Test CMS validation rules with valid and invalid data
  - Verify error handling scenarios
  - Test authorization/authentication flows

- Documentation:
  - Document API endpoints with request/response examples
  - List all CMS compliance rules being validated
  - Provide error code reference guide
